body_html:
I think that in the context of High level API the dataset api that it is producing optimized batches need to comunicate with the estimator that is aware of the batch loss. I think that both the components needs to have an API to interact among them.
What do you think? Probably this type of communication could be useful also for other techniques related to curriculum learning like: https://arxiv.org/abs/1801.00904
